doc.name: second
doc.summary: Designates the second member of a set.

examples.example: go to the second card of stack "Games Central"
put "b" into second character of theLetters

description.p: Use the second keyword in an object reference or chunk expression.
The second keyword can be used to specify any object whose number property is 2. It can also be used to designate the second chunk in a chunk expressionl
The word "the" is optional when using the second keyword
